entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Moose Jaw
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:24 AM CST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Drizzle, -7.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Moose Jaw 05:51 AM CST Thursday 19 January 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Drizzle
Temperature: -7.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -7.6°C
Wind: E 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 19 January 2023
